metadata.name: WBDC Neon Graff
metadata.description:
This Disciplined1's first NFT created for the NFT Onboarding Class at Work Build Dream Create University

Holders of this NFT receive a 30% discount on any physical artwork created and sold by DEE, aka Disciplined1.  Discount is not transferrable and the NFT must be in your wallet at the time of purchase.  Discount can only be applied to physical artwork(canvas art, sculptures, murals and private commissions).  NFT's and other digital artwork not included.
